CustomField.description: Calc field for data studio to mark the date the KPI was missed
CustomField.formula:
IF( Time_To_Account_Number_KPI_SLA_Met__c = 0,
(IF(CONTAINS( TEXT(Custodian__c) , "Schwab"), Agreement_Received__c + 35, Agreement_Received__c + 20)), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Calc field for data studio to mark the date the KPI was missed
CustomField.label: Time to Account Number KPI Missed
